main_definition: With great force, intensity, or conviction.

meanings_and_examples.example: She strongly believes in equal rights for all.
He pushed the door strongly to open it.

meanings_and_examples.definition: With great conviction or firmness of opinion.
meanings_and_examples.example: I strongly disagree with your point of view.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Highly or very much so in terms of quality, degree, quantity, etc.
meanings_and_examples.example: The soup has a strong flavor that overpowers other ingredients.
